events.name: Mooncake Festival
events.description: At our first General Body Meeting of the year, we will not only be celebrating the Mooncake Festival, but we will also be introducing the new school year's Chinese Student Association. Students will learn about the club, be introduced to the new E-Board, meet new friends, and learn about the Mooncake Festival all the while enjoying some delicious mooncake and snacks. Come and join us, especially if you are new to campus!

events.name: Concessions
events.description: Each year, CSA will work at its concession stand during home football games! You will have the opportunity to prepare and fry food, serve customers, and enjoy as much of the food we make as you want while helping out. Please sign up on the signup sheet that will be posted on our Facebook page (or email us at csacollegepark@gmail.com) if you would like to help. Come join us!

events.name: Big/Little Week
events.description: Ever wanted to be spoiled with food and bubble tea? Or to give someone all of your love, affection, and attention instead of looking through memes on Subtle Asian Dating all day? Come to our Big/Little Week events to be a part of a family who will love and care for you in your best and worst times throughout the year!

events.name: Hot Pot Night
events.description: Come enjoy some hotpot with CSA! For a small fee, you will devour an assortment of delicious food with a table of people. We will provide food, materials, and even entertainment. Just show up and prepare to feast!

events.name: Lunar Banquet
events.description: Lunar Banquet, our biggest event of the year, celebrates Lunar New Year. Food and entertainment are always provided. It is a great chance for everyone to gather around and celebrate the start of the new year.
